category.name: PSM
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: PS_bvr_names_to_carryover
preference.preference_description: Determines whether a PSBOMViewRevision (BVR) object will carry its modified name over to a copy (whether done with revise or save-as or structure duplication, etc.) of that PSBOMViewRevision. If the list of values is empty or none match the altered name, then the new copy of the PSBOMViewRevision will generate a default name based on the newly associated Item ID and BOM View Type name. Valid Values: * - Wildcard, will match any BVR name. (any entire BVR name) - Will match only that exact BVR name.
